channel.title: The many uses of MESG
channel.description:
MESG is a developer’s playground: an ecosystem that includes a Marketplace and an Engine working together to solve interoperability, scalability, and efficiency issues in app development.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/the-many-uses-of-mesg/
